issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Fix homebrew-cpp again
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9410](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9410). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
brew audit is now failing because python is an alias: https://travis-ci.org/github/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/706771359

This was changed upstream months ago.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9410?focusedCommentId=17155776) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7707
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7707>
